cpp.edu.cs.cs141.escapethedung

Class Gun

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpp.edu.cs.cs141.escapethedung.Gun

  • public class Gun
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the GUNs in the game. The player will have a gun chosen at the beginning of the game and the enemy will always spawn with a random GUN. This class holds all the attributes of the GUN and will check if it is loaded.
    Author:
    Ethan

    • Constructor Detail

      • Gun

        public Gun(int gunNumber)
        Parameters:
        gunNumber - This constructor will create a GUN object. There are three types of gun and each gun has attributes: name, accuracy, damage, ammo, and max ammo. Below is a list of weapons along with the descriptions of the weapons. 1 - PISTOL | Accuracy: 75% | Damage: 1 | Ammo: 15 | Max Ammo: 15 2 - RIFLE | Accuracy: 65% | Damage: 2 | Ammo: 10 | Max Ammo: 10 3 - SHOTGUN | Accuracy: 40% | Damage: 5 | Ammo: 5 | Max Ammo: 5

        Returns:

      • useAmmo

        public void useAmmo()
        This method will reduce the current ammo in the GUN by 1.

      • replenishAmmo

        public void replenishAmmo()
        This method will replenish the ammo inside GUN to the max ammo it can hold.

      • getMaxAmmo

        public int getMaxAmmo()
        Returns:
        the max ammo a GUN can hold.

      • checkAmmo

      • checkLoaded

        public boolean checkLoaded()
        Returns:
